title: Cosmic Queries – The 30-Second Universe
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson, co-host Chuck Nice, and astrophysicist and StarTalk geek-in-chief Charles Liu, PhD answer fan-submitted questions on gravity, asteroids, AI, spacetime, and more to celebrate the release of Charles’ new book “30-Second Universe.”


NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons and All-Access subscribers can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/show/cosmic-queries-the-30-second-universe/


Thanks to this week’s Patrons for supporting us:

Jim Brown, Christopher MacCay, Carlene Goodbody, Ernesto Chavez, Doug Sherman
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
